data.text: @OttCatholicSB ..for protecting the kids? When did infection control become a DIY project? Staying healthy and engaged in in-person learning is the goal and it is blatantly unclear to me how ditching masks (at this point in time) in the public setting of schools will achieve this...

@OttCatholicSB Well we are starring down the barrel of large student amd staff absences. So much for protecting staff and students. Dr Moore will wear his mask in all public places - is a classroom with 30 kids not a public place. Let's leave it to the kids to decide? Are adults not responsible
@DanielleMcGee @OttCatholicSB @gsmoore2 @OCSBWittet @OCSBWarren Mask yourself. Stop bullying kids. https://t.co/PXzceUjPyj
@OttCatholicSB @DivInfantOCSB Great news! Thanks for the update
